Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION
REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION

Title: Requires disclosures required in advertisements using the title "coach"
Summary: Requires disclosures required in advertisements using the title "coach"; defines the title "coach" as a professional designation, credential, certification, or professional description that indicates the person has expertise or training in issues specifically related to providing care or help in choosing a career in their field; provides civil penalties for violations; makes related provisions.
LawCode: Add ยง350-b-2, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to disclosures required in advertisements using the title "coach"
